# vscode常用插件

  1. Tabnineopen in new window: AI 代码完成插。
  2. Trailing Spacesopen in new window:尾部空格删除插件。

# 几乎必备的

  1. 两款都为代码段插件：
    JavaScript (ES6) code snippetsopen in new window
    ES7 React/Redux/GraphQL/React-Native snippetsopen in new window
